smac.controller

Class LogController

  • java.lang.Object
    • smac.controller.LogController

  • public class LogController
extends java.lang.Object
    LogController allows the application to log all error messages to a log in Syslog format.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Bishan Kumar Madhoo
